ch.powerunit.rules

Interface SystemStreamRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TestListenerRule, TestRule

    public interface SystemStreamRule
extends TestListenerRule
    This is a test rule to change the system out/ err stream.

    This rule will replace the stream with the passed one ; In case it is not possible to change the stream (because of a SecurityException) no change is done and the exception is ignored.

    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    borettim
